class mgTLRect

Detailed Description

mgTLRecisects is a proprietry class for Face tessellation.

mgTLRecisects holds all the intersections of the rectangle with a loop. In mgTLRecisects, intersections are sorted in the anti-clock-wise along the rectangle perimter. On return from mgTLRects constructor, m_Recisects[2*j] is the point that is going into the rectangle and m_Recisects[2*j+1] is going out. These two points always makes a pair.

Member Data Documentation

std::vector<mgTLRecisect> mgTLRecisects::m_Recisects

m_Recisects are intersections of the rectangle with a loop.

In m_Recisects, intersections are sorted in the anti-clock-wise along the rectangle perimter. On return from mgTLRects constructor, m_Recisects[2*j] is the point that is going into the rectangle and m_Recisects[2*j+1] is going out. These two points always makes a pair.
